alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Noble, northeastern Logan, western Payne and southeastern Garfield Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Lake Carl Blackwell, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Perry, Perkins, Langston, Coyle, Orlando, Lake Carl Blackwell, Lake Mcmurtry, Lucien and Hayward. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 168 and 193. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
